name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with over 13 years of experience specializing in high-performance application development. Proficient in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **Spring Data JPA**, and **Spring Security**, with a strong focus on implementing **microservices** architectures and adhering to **SOLID principles** and **design patterns**. Demonstrated ability to leverage tools like **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for effective containerization and orchestration.
Skilled in building scalable solutions with **PostgreSQL** and utilizing **Redis** for caching to enhance performance. Experienced in test-driven development with **JUnit** and implementing CI/CD practices using **Test Containers**.
Deeply knowledgeable in delivering compliant solutions with a strong emphasis on security standards, including **OAuth2** for authentication. Strong collaboration skills, working effectively in **Agile** environments and managing tasks using **JIRA**. Adding unique strengths in deploying AI/ML-powered platforms and a comprehensive background in cloud technology with **AWS** and **Azure** integration.
